title: Dave Ramsey's Financial Peace University 2014 (fixed)
description:
Videos from the most recent FPU (Financial Peace University) seminar in mp4 format. Learning to handle money and planning for the future from a Christian perspective. Regardless of your religious beliefs, the ideas he teaches in handling money are pretty awesome. If you don't like these videos please go troll elsewhere as I don't care.

9 gigs, in 1 torrent, 11 files. I had downloaded the older versions of FPU on here, but with some of the banking laws, some of the videos were not longer as accurate.


Episodes:

 Lesson 1: Super Saving 

 Lesson 2: Relating with Money

 Lesson 3: Cash Flow Planning

 Lesson 4: Dumping Debt

 Lesson 5: Buyer Beware

 Lesson 6: The Role of Insurance

 Lesson 7: Retirement and College Planning

 Lesson 8: Real Estate & Mortgages

 Lesson 9: The Great Misunderstanding

Bonus Videos:

 Credit Sharks in Suits

 That's Not Good Enough

One Piece of advice given, in his 'Credit Sharks in Suits' video, Dave makes mention of negotiating pennies on the dollar with creditors within 30 days after a judgement has been ruled, however, (according to the gentlemen who led the class) once that gavel hits, they have you. The best time to negotiate for pennies on the dollar is just before you go to court.

Sorry for lack of thumbs but this is my first upload and it's really just being put here for a friend and anyone else who may be interested.
